Text.Page:
I think we've got this spot pretty well in hand. A few more decisive blows to the enemy's troops and they'll turn tail, I'm sure!

You have great energy, soldier, and I want you to share that with Tairun, my underling at the scout camp south-east of here. A real warrior will remind him how to fight!
Cafnil sent you? That's...lovely. Sorry, not your fault. You must be pretty tough. Smart? We'll see. Ask around camp. I'm sure you'll find things to do.
